DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness life style counsel programme design overweight obese child parent group compare traditional individual counseling pediatric outpatient clinic community . The two intervention hospital community base .
DOC.brief_title: The Activity School Finnmark Overweight Children
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized study design two parallel groups.Active intervention two year , last follow-up 3 year .
DOC.criteria: Overweight obese . BMI > IOTF ( International Obesity TaskForce ) cutpoints 27,5. kg/ m2 . Diseases compatible normal physical activity . Disorders compatible group treatment .
